elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Make a note of which facets of your "inner beauty" are particularly important to you:

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Together, find ways to improve your "inner beauty" and write down your thoughts:
elements.correctAnswer: Empathy, listening, showing interest and compassion, being able to tell interesting stories, living humor, education and intelligence, generosity, tolerance, spreading a good mood, radiating calm and security, helpfulness, satisfaction, success (in work and relationships), health, reliability, patience, talent as a speaker, having ideas/fantasy/visions, originality, honesty and openness, ...
